item.title: kubernetes metrics options
item.description: Components Description Metrics Scaler Metrics Server Metrics Server collects resource metrics from Kubelets and exposes them in Kubernetes apiserver through Metrics API for use by Horizontal Pod Autoscaler and Vertical Pod Autoscaler. Metrics API can also be accessed by kubectl top, making it easier to debug autoscaling pipelines. Metrics Server is not meant for non-autoscaling purposes CPU/Memory
